attributes.action: allow Maddame Tausauds to create an Alex Williams Nolan wax work.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to get a wax work of Alex Williams Nolan created at Maddame Tausauds. The guy is a complete legend, so friendly and respectful. He really is loved by everyone and we feel that a wax work of the legend is required.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
